5007.name: Unknown
5007.message:
Miiverse functions are unavailable
to this Nintendo Network ID.

For details, please start Miiverse
5007.short_description: Your PNID has been banned from Juxtaposition
5007.long_description:
Your Pretendo Network ID has been banned from Juxtaposition.

This typically occurs because of a violation of the Code of Conduct, or other offenses on the Network or the Discord server.
5007.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
5007.long_solution: For more information, launch the Miiverse app, or request to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/pretendo).
